Entries.default: "Meet her eye when you've got bad news. She respects that."
"The hazanui's a cannonball - cold as winter until suddenly she's not."
"I don't think she likes me. I spent most of my career escorting foreign ships."
"Many have. She's got nothing against scrambleroots. But don't stare at her hand."
"Before, I escorted ships out of Aedyr, the Dyrwood. Even the Republics."
"What brought you to the Royal Deadfire Company?"
"Looking for another contract. And I'd been ready to return to the rough country."
"Well, if things go the way the hazanui's hoping..."
"Not here. Not now."
"My brother and his kids live in a farming collective back home. Barely making it by."
"They ever considered trying their luck abroad?"
"Sure, but imagine if they didn't have to. That's why I'm here. Why I joined."
"Crookspur'll make a good base. As long as we keep the flies from coming back."
"Don't underestimate the slavers. They may be disorganized, but they're crafty."
"They're faithless freebooters who'd turn on each other over the flip of a coin! They-"
"Oh, no offense."
"None taken. But you're getting the next round."
"Atsura should've sent us after the slavers. We'd wipe them out before breakfast."
"Looks like the weather may change for your brother's family soon enough."
"Truly. Though after what I've told him about Deadfire, they may come here."
"After we settle matters on Ukaizo."
"Better rest up. We'll be escorting the Blade of TƒÅkowa to the storm's edge."
"Then here's to clear skies."
"And calm seas."
"Was that a Gunhawk at Imperial Command? I've never met one in person."
"The best shots in Eora. The ranga nui keeps them for important work."
"Train? That's just how they catch their dinner."
"Is it true they train by shooting featherfish in midair?"
